name: 格雷丝·恩德里图
name_full: 格雷丝·恩德里图 Grace Ndiritu

last_movies.title: Black Beauty: For a Shamanic Cinema

introduction: Grace Ndiritu is a British-Kenyan artist whose artworks are concerned with the transformation of our contemporary world. Her work has been featured in international magazines and is housed in museum collections such as the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York and the Modern Art Museum, Warsaw. Her writing on art and politics has been published in her nonfiction book “Dissent Without Modification” (Bergen Kunsthall, 2021), in Whitechapel Gallery: Documents of Contemporary Art, and in the “Paris Review,” among others.
